The claim made on Facebook by the page G: com stating that "combined doses of vaccines have never been tested" is false.
The authenticity of the claim was verifi: the director of the Institute For Vaccine Safety at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.
Salmon referred to a December 2008 docum: S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) that reviewed federal vaccine safety programs and public health activities.
The document stated that vaccine safety: including testing and evaluation before the vaccine is licensed and recommended, as well as monitoring after it is recommended for the public.
